page.title: 06TRAIN SERVICES AT WORKSOP
page.content: The passenger train service operates between Lincoln and Sheffield, via Retford. There is a good service from Retford to London. Trains go to Cleethorpes every day and in the Summer trains run to Skegness on Saturdays. Cleethorpes and Skegness are popular holiday resorts for this area. Each day there are 15 passenger trains from Sheffield. All the trains are diesels. Passenger trains have two coaches with an engine on the front and on the back. They carry 150 passengers, a driver and a guard. The last train from Sheffield is at 10.11pm. Trains leave for Sheffield every hour, a day return ticket costing Â£1.50p.
